definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: He learned carelessly and was not hard-working at all.
sentences.chinese: 他學習馬馬虎虎，很不用功。

sentences.english: He tinkered with my old clock.
sentences.chinese: 他馬馬虎虎地修理我的舊鐘。

sentences.english: Your mother prefers to do her own housekeeping -- even if it is a little slapdash.
sentences.chinese: 即便有點精心馬虎了，你母親還是更喜歡自己做家務。

sentences.english: Don't palter with this question, answer it properly.
sentences.chinese: 不要馬馬虎虎地對待這個問題，好好回答。

sentences.english: He was castigated for his carelessness in doing homework.
sentences.chinese: 他由於做作業時馬馬虎虎而受到申斥。

sentences.english: He does his work anyhow, without taking any care or trouble over it.
sentences.chinese: 他幹起活來馬馬虎虎，既不當心，又不認真。

sentences.english: I am firm with each, the pangs are sharp yet unavoidable.
sentences.chinese: 我對每個人都不馬虎，因爲劇痛雖厲害，可是免不了。

sentences.english: Failures caused by sloppiness or laziness are bad.
sentences.chinese: 因馬虎或懶惰導致的失敗是壞事。

sentences.english: B. Just so-so. Are you still working at your old company?
sentences.chinese: 馬馬虎虎。你還在原來的公司上班嗎？

sentences.english: Products must be strictly, not carelessly, inspected before they leave the factory.
sentences.chinese: 產品出廠要嚴格檢查，馬馬虎虎可不行。

sentences.english: With the ability to self-test and slovenly problems to overcome.
sentences.chinese: 有了自檢的能力，馬虎的毛病才能克服。

sentences.english: A little inaccuracy sometimes saves tons of explanation.
sentences.chinese: 打個馬虎眼有時可省卻許多口舌來解釋。

sentences.english: Don’t scamp your work because you are pressed for time.
sentences.chinese: 不要因爲時間倉促而馬馬虎虎。

sentences.english: Before then he was good at "fudging" through things but not enough.
sentences.chinese: 在此之前，他很擅長於馬虎了事。

sentences.english: According to our survey report. the goods were carelessly packed.
sentences.chinese: 根據我們的商檢報告，貨物包裝得很馬虎。

sentences.english: Strictly inspect the first part will led to Stabilize producing process.
sentences.chinese: 首件檢驗不馬虎，製程穩定無錯誤。

definition: as one wishes/according to one's wishes/at will/voluntary/conscious
many and complicated/mired in minor details
to expend a great deal of effort
in no way/not in the least/absolutely not
to discuss two disparate things together (idiom); to mention on equal terms/to place on a par with/(often with negatives: impossible to mention X in the same breath as Y)
to pay particular attention to/carefully selected for quality/tastefully chosen
to let off/to let slip by/to let sb get away with sth
let alone/to say nothing of/besides/what's more
